mapper.select: select id, name, image, category, choice_ratio, price from trims_options join options on trims_options.option_id = options.id where trim_id = #{trimId} and option_type = 'extra' order by option_id;

select id, name, image, category, choice_ratio, use_count from trims_options join options on trims_options.option_id = options.id where trim_id = #{trimId} and option_type = 'default' order by option_id;
select name from package_hashtag join hashtag on package_hashtag.hashtag_id = hashtag.id where package_id = #{packageId} order by hashtag_id limit 5;
select name from options_hashtag join hashtag on options_hashtag.hashtag_id = hashtag.id where option_id = #{optionId} order by hashtag_id limit 5;
